title: Women should be given leadership in building Sri Lanka, says President Rajapaksa
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Nalin Hewapathirana) International Women’s Day (IWD) falls tomorrow (08 March) and Sri Lanka celebrated this special day which is dedicated for women around the globe today on 07 March, the day before the official day at Sugathadasa Indoor Stadium. International Women’s Day was marked for the first…
